billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

title: Sets forth procedures to be followed in the event a sex offender fails to mail a signed verification within twenty calendar days of mailing by DCJS
summary: Sets forth procedures to be followed in the event a sex offender fails to mail a signed verification within twenty calendar days of mailing by the division of criminal justice services.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to sex offender verification
